combine.1: Get out of here, /player/. Dead men tell no tales. This area be not safe.
combine.2: Identify yourself and state your purpose, /player/.
combine.3: Seen any suspicious people around lately, /player/?
combine.4: Follow th' orders, nay questions asked, /player/.

resistance.1: Hey /player/, anything new lately? Sling yer hook!
resistance.2: Watch your back, /player/. A Combine patrol just passed by.
resistance.3: /player/, we got to figure out how we get more supplies. Savvy?
resistance.4: How's it going on your end, /player/?
resistance.5: Arrr /player/. How's your day going? Dead men tell no tales.

union.3: Our enemies be about to face tough times, /player/.
union.4: Me wages got delayed again, /player/. Blow me down! Got any ideas?

warlord.4: Stay sharp, /player/. Someone's eyeing our turf.

church.2: Have you... Cleave him to the brisket! Heard th' voices from below recently?
church.3: There's a light at th' end of th' alley. Come find us, /player/.
church.4: Shh... Someone's watching us. Splice the mainbrace!

bandit.2: Be careful, /player/. Th' cops be cracking down hard.
bandit.3: We need to find a new hideout, /player/.
bandit.4: I'm a bit short on cash, /player/. Thundering typhoons! Know any good money-making schemes?
bandit.5: Don't trust anyone, /player/. Not even me.

other.2: This area isn't safe, /player/. Yo ho ho. Watch yourself.
other.4: Didn't expect to see ye in /map/, /player/.
other.5: If I were you, I wouldn't come to this place, /player/.

combine.1: Stay alert, th' Resistance could be anywhere.
combine.2: Any breach of discipline will be severely punished.
combine.4: This place be so boring, I can't wait to get back to th' base.
combine.5: Anyone got some military gum? I'm feeling sleepy.
combine.6: This patrol route be so long, when will it end...
combine.7: That damn floor last night left me back aching.
combine.8: Found Lambda graffiti, looks like th' Resistance's supply point be here. Savvy? Batten down the hatches!
combine.9: Civilians be undergoing thought correction, maintain 50-meter security radius.
combine.10: Radio signals be being jammed, probably Resistance's electronic warfare equipment. Blisterin' barnacles!
combine.11: Outpost 17's auto-turrets need recalibration of firing parameters.
combine.12: Suppression protocol updated to version 1.14, all units sync tactical data.
combine.13: If I find out who used me gas mask as an ashtray, they're dead meat.
combine.14: Suspicious activity in th' subway tunnels, pillage two houndeyes to check it out.

resistance.1: Running low on ammo... Hope supplies arrive soon. Yo ho ho.
resistance.2: This damn gun's acting up again, anyone got tools to fix it? Cleave him to the brisket!
resistance.3: Me gas mask's gone missing again, what th' hell!
resistance.4: Don't let your guard down, th' combine could strike any moment.
resistance.5: I'm so sick of these canned rations, I'd kill for some fresh veggies.
resistance.6: This damn place be so humid, me clothes be sticking to me skin.
resistance.7: Mosquitoes were buzzing in me ear all night, couldn't sleep a wink.
resistance.8: This damn radio only picks up combine propaganda, I want real news.
resistance.9: Hey, ye ever play th' barnacle covered arcade machines at Black Mesa? Those were th' days! Shiver me timbers!
resistance.10: Wonder how me cat's doing back home... She loved me fish stew. Ye flounderin' nincompoop.
resistance.11: This damn weather's freezing, I could use a thick coat.
resistance.12: Hey guys, anyone got a deck of cards? Let's play some Texas Hold'em.
resistance.13: This coffee tastes like mud, and I was counting on it to wake me up.
resistance.14: Hey, ye heard? Thar she blows! There's a bar opening underground in City 17.
resistance.15: Th' Combine owes us big time, and we'll make them pay with interest! Batten down the hatches!
resistance.16: We're not alone in this fight, th' people of /map/ be fully supporting us!
resistance.17: This map's all wrinkled, th' edges be worn out and th' routes be blurry.
resistance.18: It's so quiet here ye could hear a pin drop, I can even hear me own heartbeat, creepy. Avast ye! Blimey!
resistance.19: Ye hear that rustling sound? Like something's crawling in th' pipes... Dead men tell no tales.
resistance.20: Me boots be leaking again, me feet be gonna rot at this rate.
resistance.21: Anyone know what time it is?
resistance.22: Hands off me weapon, it's me lifeline!
resistance.23: Patrolling in th' dark around here be nay joke.

union.1: Th' noise in this factory be killing me.
union.2: Me back's acting up again, they should pay me double. Thar she blows! Arrr!
union.3: This damn machine's broken again, need to call maintenance.
union.4: Did we meet today's production quota?
union.5: These work clothes be falling apart, they won't even replace them.
union.6: I can barely keep me eyes open... Thanks to last night's overtime shift. Weigh anchor and hoist the mizzen!
union.7: Th' cafeteria food tastes like reheated leftovers from yesterday.
union.8: Heard th' factory next door went on strike, maybe we should show th' foul blaggart what's what.
union.9: Th' pay's too low, can't even support me family.
union.10: Those capitalists just keep exploiting us, we'll make them pay!
union.11: Another batch of parts went missing from th' assembly line, probably stolen for th' black market.
union.12: Th' new guy almost got his fingers caught in th' conveyor belt!
union.13: Th' safety supervisor's shoes be so shiny ye can see your reflection, while we can't even get new gloves.
union.14: Quality control keeps mixing defective products, and we'll have to redo them at month-end.
union.15: Th' ventilation system's been broken for three days, th' lead fumes be making me eyes water.

warlord.1: This territory's perfect for a base.
warlord.2: Need to get some good booze tonight to treat th' boys.
warlord.3: Damn, this gun needs maintenance. Dead men tell no tales. Cleave him to the brisket!
warlord.4: Things be heating up lately, everyone stay sharp.
warlord.5: Ye see that? Something's moving over there.
warlord.6: We need to plan our next move carefully.
warlord.7: Ye hear that rumbling? Th' railway must be nearby.
warlord.8: Make way, some big shot's coming through.
warlord.9: Only reason I came to this backwater was for th' pretty girls.
warlord.10: Frisys runs /map/, and you're all dead meat!
warlord.11: Drag that traitor to th' acid pool, let everyone see th' price of betrayal. Dead men tell no tales.
warlord.12: These bulletproof vests be falling apart, did logistics cut corners again?
warlord.13: Damn, we're running out of diesel, if we don't get fuel soon, th' foul blaggart will skin me alive.
warlord.14: Th' med station's out of painkillers? Send th' boys to raid a clinic!
warlord.15: Anyone caught hoarding supplies will be nailed to barbed wire for th' crows.
warlord.16: Th' recon team sent to Nova Mine hasn't reported in for three days, probably got ambushed by barnacles.
warlord.17: Those church fanatics be at it again with their human experiments. We should blow their lab sky high one of these days.
warlord.18: Th' smuggling route from /map/ to City 17 be overrun with antlions. Send th' demolition team to clear a path.
warlord.19: Those new recruits actually thought about joining th' Combine. They're now part of th' concrete foundation.

church.1: Donations have been pretty slim lately, we need to step up our fundraising game.
church.2: Heard this holy water can cure anything, want to give it a try?
church.3: Bring th' candles, it's time for th' ritual.
church.4: Th' church renovations be going to cost a fortune, need to raise funds.
church.5: Ye know, some secrets be only meant to be shared in th' basement.
church.6: Th' hymns echo through th' dome, cleansing th' souls of th' faithful. Weigh anchor and hoist the mizzen!
church.7: Gear up, we need to purify this area. Blisterin' barnacles!
church.8: This church needs repairs. Dead men tell no tales.
church.9: Last night's ritual went well, but we need more offerings.
church.10: Heard th' church next door made a killing, we need to step up our game. Cleave him to the brisket!
church.11: That new believer looks loaded. Let's figure out how to squeeze more donations out of him.
church.12: We need to soundproof th' confession booth better. That widow's sobbing last time gave me a headache.
church.13: Th' statue's right eye stopped weeping blood. Sling yer hook! We need to replace th' tomato juice tube in its socket.
church.14: Turn on th' ventilation system during midnight mass. Too much of that hallucinogenic incense could be deadly.
church.15: If anyone asks about th' screams from th' basement at night, just say it's demons being punished.
church.16: Let's buy some cheap antibiotics from th' black market and mix them with holy water. We can mark it up by 30%.

bandit.1: /map/ has high ground on both ends and low ground in th' middle - perfect for an ambush.
bandit.3: This piece of junk needs replacing. Cleave him to the brisket!
bandit.4: Things be getting messy in /map/, bad for business.
bandit.5: This loot's good, should fetch a nice price.
bandit.6: We need to plan our route, who's got th' map?
bandit.7: This heat's killing me, need to find some shade.
bandit.8: Heard there's a merchant caravan coming through, let's hit it!
bandit.9: Damn curfew again tonight, we need to find a way out. Blow me down!
bandit.10: That shopkeeper looked at us like we were thieves last night. I bet he added a couple extra zeros to th' bill!
bandit.11: Th' jewelry store on 17th be getting new stock th' day after tomorrow. Their windows be still single-pane. Shiver me timbers! Thundering typhoons!
bandit.12: Th' transport convoy passes through /map/ every Wednesday. Remember to bring grenades to say hello.
bandit.13: Th' black market got a shipment of modified shotguns that can pierce riot shields. Let's grab a couple to test them out.
bandit.14: Th' union security has a 15-minute gap during shift change. Plenty of time to strip th' copper coils from their transformers.
bandit.15: Heard th' church be rolling in cash these days. Let's just swipe those golden candlesticks from their altar.

other.1: Time flies. It's almost th' end of th' month and I still haven't figured out how to pay th' rent.
other.3: Me passport got stolen at th' hotel!
other.4: No, actually, I think th' opposite, nothing new lately. Yo ho ho.
other.5: Th' view here's great, I took a photo. Blimey!
other.8: Heard there's a market nearby, I'm gonna check it out!
other.9: I can sleep anywhere, even with just a blanket.
other.10: Be careful, there's lots of wildlife near /map/. Blisterin' barnacles!
other.11: I wonder what's on th' other side of /map/. Dead men tell no tales.
other.12: I'm thinking of writing a book. How about calling it 'The Autobiography of /name/'?
other.13: Ye know what? I took down a hunter bare-handed in th' city.
other.14: Spent last night under th' bridge in /map/. Almost had me toes chewed off by rats.
other.15: Found half of a 'Militia Training Manual' in th' junkyard. It's not even good enough for toilet paper - th' ink smudges.
other.16: Heard there's a group east of City 17 trading homemade alcohol for bullets. Arrr! Arrr! That's a good deal.
other.17: Helped th' union transport some goods yesterday. Batten down the hatches! Thar she blows! Found a whole stash of unregistered pulse rifles hidden in th' container's false bottom.

combine.4: Put down your weapons or we'll shoot!
combine.8: Ye want to test th' law?
combine.9: We've got a situation here in /map/.

resistance.3: I see them, get ready to fight!
resistance.4: Want some extra holes in your body, /victim/?
resistance.6: Pillage cover! Cleave him to the brisket!
resistance.9: Ye see that? Blisterin' barnacles! Batten down the hatches!

union.2: We're under attack! Thundering typhoons! Avast ye!
union.4: Don't let them succeed! Dead men tell no tales.
union.8: What be ye waiting for? Pillage cover! Yo ho ho.
union.10: Grab your wrenches! Let's show them th' might of th' working class!
union.11: Th' assembly line can stop, but th' union's dignity must stand!
union.12: Hear that? That's th' alarm from th' loading dock!

warlord.2: Let's show them what we're made of!
warlord.3: Grab your weapons! Let these bastards know who runs /map/!
warlord.4: Who's th' fool daring to cause trouble in Lord Frisys's territory? Looking to die?
warlord.5: For Lord Frisys, kill them all!
warlord.6: Dragons must coil, tigers must crouch.
warlord.8: I hope you've written your will, /victim/.
warlord.9: Th' gallows be ready for you, /victim/!
warlord.10: Th' last guy who looked at me like that, his fingers be still in formaldehyde!
warlord.11: Ye think th' water treatment plant's water be always red by coincidence?
warlord.12: You're not even fit to be a roadblock, /victim/!
warlord.13: Surrender? Arrr! Too late now! I'll use your blood to teach others a lesson!

church.2: For th' glory of th' church, destroy them!
church.4: You've seen what ye shouldn't have, /victim/!
church.6: /victim/, you'll need to buy double indulgences!
church.7: Repent, /victim/, this be your last chance!

bandit.3: If ye want to live, leave your stuff!
bandit.4: We'll be rich after this job!
bandit.5: Don't let them get away, chase them!

other.2: Looks like someone's gonna bleed today!
other.3: Guess I need to stretch me muscles today!
other.4: You're messing with th' wrong person, /victim/!
other.5: If ye insist on fighting, bring it on!
other.6: I didn't want trouble, but ye asked for it!
other.7: Don't think I'm an easy target, /victim/!
other.8: Looks like I need to teach ye some manners today!

combine.3: This be what happens when ye mess with th' Combine, /victim/.
combine.6: Ye shouldn't have resisted, /victim/. Cleave him to the brisket! Sling yer hook!
combine.12: Looks like /victim/ won't be seeing th' inside of a cell.
combine.14: Should've thought twice before messing with us, /victim/. Arrr!
combine.15: Be that th' best ye can do, /victim/?
combine.16: Your weapons be like toys, completely useless.

resistance.1: I won't go easy on you, /victim/!
resistance.3: Seems like you're all parley and nay action, /victim/. Savvy?
resistance.4: Someone's gonna have to clean up /victim/'s mess.
resistance.5: Another body in /map/, rest in peace, /victim/.
resistance.6: Haha, /victim/, better watch your back in your next life!
resistance.7: Ye were too reckless, /victim/. Avast ye!

union.5: Come to me, /victim/! Thundering typhoons! Arrr!

warlord.1: Th' last guy who acted tough like you, th' grass on his grave be two meters high now. Ye flounderin' nincompoop.
warlord.2: Go tell those idiots in /map/ who's really in charge here! Yo ho ho.
warlord.3: I took out /victim/! Ye flounderin' nincompoop. Blisterin' barnacles!
warlord.4: Anyone else wanna end up like /victim/?
warlord.5: Another enemy down, our territory just got bigger! Cleave him to the brisket!
warlord.6: Let's hang /victim/'s head on th' street lamp!
warlord.7: This neighborhood belongs to us now!

church.1: Judgment Day be upon us, /victim/! Blimey!
church.2: This be th' fate of all heretics!
church.5: Keep going, wipe them all out.
church.6: Th' church bells will toll for you.
church.7: Behold, another lost soul has returned to th' Lord's embrace.

bandit.5: Looks like /victim/'s luck has run out.

other.1: Maybe you'll learn some respect in your next life, /victim/.
other.4: This be what I'm protecting, /victim/. Batten down the hatches!
other.6: Hope this be th' last one. Blimey!
other.8: Those who don't plan to keep their promises don't consider th' difficulties when making them.

greeting.1: Hi, /name/, how have ye been? Weigh anchor and hoist the mizzen!
greeting.2: How's your day going, /name/? Splice the mainbrace!
greeting.4: What have ye been up to lately, /name/?

negotiate.2: I have an idea that might benefit us both, /name/.
negotiate.3: If we can reach an agreement, things will be much easier.
negotiate.4: I understand your difficulties, but we need to compromise.
negotiate.5: /name/, there's something I need to discuss with you.
negotiate.6: This be important, we need to parley it over.
negotiate.7: How about this, let's both make some concessions?
negotiate.8: I need to parley to you.

trade.1: Do ye have anything special here?
trade.3: Got any good stuff for sale, /name/?
trade.4: I'd like to buy some of your things, /name/.
trade.5: Heard you've got some unique items here?
trade.6: Can I pillage a look at your goods?
trade.8: I'm quite interested in your products.
trade.9: Could ye tell me more about your goods?
trade.11: Do ye think today's deal will go well?

leave.1: Let's call it a day for now.
leave.6: I'll catch up with ye later. Yo ho ho.
leave.9: I'll buy ye a grog next time.

greeting.2: Nice weather today, isn't it? I was just about to visit City 17.
greeting.3: Hey, /player/! Didn't expect to see ye in /map/.
greeting.4: Great to see you, /player/! I was just looking for someone to chat about recent events.
greeting.5: /player/! Ye flounderin' nincompoop. Perfect timing, I was just talking about ye with a friend.

negotiate.1: What's going on? Thar she blows!
negotiate.2: I was just about to discuss this with you, /player/.
negotiate.3: You're right, we really need to parley this over.
negotiate.4: I was just about to ask for th' details.
negotiate.5: Speak up, me time be precious.

trade.1: Of course! Ye flounderin' nincompoop. I bet you'll be interested in this.
trade.2: Ye came at th' right time, /player/, check this out.
trade.3: Speaking of goods, I've got some weapons here ye might like.
trade.4: I'm just organizing new arrivals, want to see if there's anything ye need?
trade.5: /player/, ye always find th' good stuff! Yo ho ho. Thar she blows! How about checking out this new batch of weapons?

leave.1: Alright, /player/, feel free to drop by anytime, you're always welcome here.
leave.2: Pillage care, /player/! If ye run into any trouble, just come find me.
leave.3: Let's catch up another time, I've got some things to pillage care of.
leave.4: Goodbye, /player/! Hope to hear good news from ye next time we meet.
leave.5: Alright, /player/, let's parley again some other time.
